tasks.title: Fix database schema drift - missing tables and columns
tasks.description: Multiple pages crashed because 17 tables and many columns defined in schema.prisma were never migrated to the database. Generated and applied migration to create all missing tables (Flag, AccountabilityScore, VotingRecord, User, Session, Review, Community, etc.) and columns (Milestone.catalystMilestoneId, etc.).
acceptance_criteria: All 17 missing tables created in database
All missing columns added to existing tables
SOP updated with schema drift prevention guidance

npx tsx scripts/ingest-catalyst.ts --since=2026-02-01 ingests updates since date

Progress logging shows fund being processed

Ingestion script applies normalization on upsert
fundingAmountUSD field populated for all projects

tasks.title: Integrate community review scores into ROI

Community score = avg(alignment, feasibility, auditability) from reviews
Projects with <3 reviews use original formula (no community weight)
ROI recalculates when reviews are submitted

Project tooltip: ROI, Status, Funding amount

acceptance_criteria: Check: Expected vs actual proposal counts per fund

tasks.title: Production polish: dark mode + responsive
tasks.description: Ensure all pages support dark mode and are responsive on mobile devices.
acceptance_criteria: All pages render correctly in dark mode
No console errors in production build

tasks.title: Production QA: test all pages
tasks.description: Verify all pages render correctly, API routes return expected data, and no console errors.
acceptance_criteria: Projects directory loads and filters work
Project detail pages render with all sections
Admin pages accessible to admin users

tasks.title: Fix external links: use projectcatalyst.io instead of catalystexplorer.com
tasks.description: catalystUrl is null for all 11,356 projects. PROOF aims to replace Catalyst Explorer, so external links should point to projectcatalyst.io (the official IOG source) not catalystexplorer.com. Construct catalystUrl from projectcatalyst.io patterns. Validate milestonesUrl resolves. Update ingestion and run backfill.
acceptance_criteria: milestonesUrl validated or removed if unresolvable
External links section on project detail shows working links

tasks.title: Historical ADA/USD rates per fund
tasks.description: Replace static $0.35 ADA/USD rate with exact historical rates per fund sourced from Project Catalyst fund pages (which show both ADA and USD values). Create a FUND_HISTORICAL_RATES static lookup in currency.ts. Re-normalize all ADA-denominated projects (F10-F15). No CoinGecko needed â exact values available from official source.
acceptance_criteria: currency.ts uses per-fund historical rates instead of single default
All F10-F15 project fundingAmountUSD values recalculated
Fund page totals reflect accurate USD equivalents

tasks.title: Catalyst Explorer single-proposal enrichment
tasks.description: Fetch detailed data from Catalyst Explorer /proposals/{id} endpoint for each funded project. Extract: GitHub URLs from description/solution text, additional links, milestone summary counts, ideascale_link, any fields not captured by the list endpoint. Update ingestion to call detail endpoint for funded projects.
acceptance_criteria: GitHub URLs extracted from proposal text via regex for github.com links
githubUrl populated for projects that mention GitHub in problem/solution/website
Any additional API fields (ideascale_link, etc.) captured

tasks.title: Build milestone scraper for milestones.projectcatalyst.io (Fund 14 PoC)
tasks.description: milestones.projectcatalyst.io has no public API â official sources do not expose milestone data via any REST/GraphQL endpoint. IOG has not published data exports. Community requests for API access have gone unanswered. The only viable path is scraping public-facing project pages. Build a Python scraper (Playwright) to extract milestone data. Output JSON matching MilestoneRecord interface. SCOPE: Fund 14 only (122 funded projects) as proof of concept. If successful, expand to other funds.
acceptance_criteria: Python scraper produces valid MilestoneRecord JSON
Scraped data includes milestone status, SoM, PoA fields
Rate-limited and respectful (1 req/sec, User-Agent header)
Scraper rationale documented: no official API exists

tasks.title: Ingest milestones and update completion tracking
tasks.description: Run ingest-milestones.ts with scraped data. Verify milestone counts update on projects. Ensure project detail page shows milestones with SoM/PoA status. Verify completion rates display correctly on fund pages.
acceptance_criteria: Project detail page shows milestone section with real data
Fund completion rates reflect actual milestone progress

tasks.title: GitHub URL extraction (auto + admin UI) and sync
tasks.description: Two-pronged approach: (1) Auto-extract GitHub URLs from project fields (website, problem, solution, description) using regex. (2) Add admin UI for manual GitHub URL linking to fill gaps. Populate githubUrl, githubOwner, githubRepo. Then trigger GitHub sync via /api/admin/github/sync to fetch stars, forks, contributors, activity scores.
acceptance_criteria: GitHub URLs extracted for all projects mentioning github.com
githubOwner and githubRepo parsed from URL
GitHub sync populates stars, forks, contributors, activity score
At least 200+ projects have GitHub data after sync

tasks.title: Debug and fix wallet connect auth flow
tasks.description: Wallet connect is broken for real users with live wallets (Nami, Eternl, Lace). Debug the full auth flow: client-side wallet detection â CIP-30 enable â signData â POST /api/auth/wallet â server verification â session creation. Replace placeholder signature verification in verify.ts (lines 85-90) with actual COSESign1 verification using @emurgo/cardano-serialization-lib-nodejs or @meshsdk/core. Test end-to-end.
acceptance_criteria: Replay attacks prevented via nonce checking
Works with Nami, Eternl, Lace wallets

tasks.title: Run initial ROI calculation batch
tasks.description: After milestone and GitHub data are ingested (PROOF-132, PROOF-133), run ROI recalculation for all funded/completed projects. Verify scores are meaningful. Calculate percentiles. Display on ROI dashboard.
acceptance_criteria: ROI scores calculated for all funded projects with data
ROI dashboard shows real data instead of empty state
Top/bottom performers list reflects actual scores

tasks.title: On-chain address discovery from funding transactions
tasks.description: Cross-reference Catalyst funding transaction addresses with project records. Parse payment txHash from milestones (once ingested) to discover project wallet addresses. Populate onchainAddress. Then trigger on-chain sync to fetch tx counts, unique addresses, volume.
acceptance_criteria: On-chain addresses discovered from funding/milestone payment data
On-chain sync populates tx count, unique addresses, volume
At least funded projects with payment hashes get on-chain data
25% ROI weight for on-chain becomes meaningful

tasks.title: Graph enrichment: org links and centrality
tasks.description: Extract organization data from Catalyst Explorer or manual entry. Populate ProjectOrganization and PersonOrganization tables. Compute NetworkX-style centrality metrics (degree, betweenness) in ETL. Add cross-fund team overlap detection. Store centrality in graph API response.
acceptance_criteria: Organization nodes appear in network graph

tasks.title: Data availability indicators on project detail page
tasks.description: Add a visual indicator showing which data layers are populated for each project (milestones, GitHub, on-chain, reviews, voting). Help users understand data coverage. Show 'Data not yet available' messages instead of hiding empty sections.
acceptance_criteria: Data coverage indicator visible on project detail
Empty sections show informative message instead of being hidden
Users understand what data exists vs what's pending ingestion

tasks.title: Validate and fix external URL resolution
tasks.description: HEAD-request validate all generated external URLs (catalystUrl, milestonesUrl, explorerUrl). Fix or remove URLs that return 404. Build a URL validation utility. Add to health check endpoint.
acceptance_criteria: URL validation script checks all external links
Health check reports broken link count
Only verified URLs shown to users

tasks.title: Admin data ingestion dashboard
tasks.description: Create an admin page showing data coverage per layer: projects, milestones, GitHub, on-chain, reviews, ROI. Show ingestion run history, last sync times, error counts. Add buttons to trigger re-ingestion for specific funds or data layers.
acceptance_criteria: Admin dashboard shows counts per data layer

tasks.title: Fund comparison: accurate USD equivalents and budget utilization
tasks.description: With historical ADA/USD rates (PROOF-129), update fund pages to show accurate USD totals. Add budget utilization percentage. Show completion rate trends. Compare funding efficiency across funds.
acceptance_criteria: Fund pages show accurate USD equivalents for ADA funds
Cross-fund comparison table with normalized amounts
Rate used for conversion shown for transparency

tasks.title: Fix graph visualization: layout, edge thickness, funding labels
tasks.description: The network graph is currently unusable â a cluttered mess with no actionable insights. Edge thickness for funding amounts does not render correctly. Funding labels are not visible. Layout algorithm produces too many overlaps. Fix: (1) Fix edge thickness mapping based on funding amounts in Cytoscape stylesheet. (2) Make funding labels visible on edges. (3) Improve layout algorithm â consider cola/cose-bilkent for better spacing. (4) Add progressive disclosure: limit initial visible nodes, expand on click. (5) Improve filtering controls to reduce clutter. (6) Add zoom-dependent label visibility.
acceptance_criteria: Edge thickness visually reflects funding amount differences
Funding labels visible on edges when zoomed in
Graph layout has minimal overlaps and is readable
Filtering controls work to reduce visible nodes
Node count limited by default with option to show more
Graph provides actionable insights about fund/project/person relationships

tasks.title: Update API docs and migrate Python ETL to new CatalystExplorer API
tasks.description: The Python ETL scripts (ingest_proposals.py, ingest_voting_records.py) still use the old LIDO Nation API at lidonation.com/api/catalyst-explorer which is deprecated. Migrate to the new official API at catalystexplorer.com/api/v1. Update etl/catalyst/api.md with new endpoint documentation.
acceptance_criteria: etl/catalyst/api.md updated with new CatalystExplorer API v1 docs

tasks.title: Add fund statistics ingestion from CatalystExplorer API
tasks.description: The new CatalystExplorer API provides fund-level statistics via ?include=statistics: total_voters, total_voting_power, participation_rate, success_rate, voting_power_threshold. Add these fields to Fund schema and ingest them during fund upsert in ingest-catalyst.ts.
acceptance_criteria: Fund model has new fields: description, totalVoters, totalVotingPower, participationRate, votingPowerThreshold, successRate
Fund page displays new voter/participation stats

tasks.title: Use proper API filters in ingest-catalyst.ts for delta sync
tasks.description: Replace client-side fund and date filtering in ingest-catalyst.ts with native API query params: filter[fund], filter[status], sort=-updated_at. This makes delta syncs faster by fetching only relevant data from the server.
acceptance_criteria: buildProposalUrl uses filter[fund] instead of client-side filtering
sort=-updated_at used for delta sync efficiency
--fund and --since CLI flags work with server-side filters

tasks.title: Add reviews and links includes to proposal ingestion
tasks.description: The CatalystExplorer API supports include=reviews,links on proposal detail. Add these to the ingestion pipeline to populate official community advisor reviews and external project links.
acceptance_criteria: Proposal fetches include reviews and links relations
Official CA reviews stored in Review model or new CatalystReview model
Project links from API stored in Link model

tasks.title: Build Catalyst communities ingestion script
tasks.description: New ingestion script to fetch official Catalyst communities from /api/v1/communities with members, proposals, statistics, and social links. Store in a new CatalystCommunity model or enrich existing Community model.
acceptance_criteria: Stores community data with verified status, social links, member counts
Links community proposals to existing Project records
Communities page enriched with official Catalyst data

tasks.title: Add campaign budget tracking from fund campaigns endpoint
tasks.description: Use /api/v1/funds/{id}/campaigns to fetch per-campaign (category) budgets. Store campaign budget data and show budget utilization on fund and project pages.
acceptance_criteria: Campaign budget data fetched from API
Per-campaign budget stored (new Campaign model or enriched category data)
Budget utilization percentage shown on fund pages
Category budget context shown on project detail

tasks.title: Schema migration: new Fund and CatalystCommunity fields
tasks.description: Add new fields to Fund model (description, totalVoters, totalVotingPower, participationRate, votingPowerThreshold, successRate) and create CatalystCommunity model for official Catalyst community data.
acceptance_criteria: Fund model extended with voting/participation fields
CatalystCommunity model created with members, social links, stats
